Title: Psycho-Pass
Actors: Kana Hanazawa, Robert McCollum, Kate Oxley, Tomokazu Seki
Plot: Believing in humanity and order, policewoman Akane Tsunemori obeys the ruling, computerized, precognitive Sibyl System. But when she faces a criminal mastermind who can elude this "perfect" system, she questions both Sibyl and herself.
